The Lord of the Rings Online

wikitext.*:
'''Yews''' were a [[tree]] whose wood was used for bows. [[Bard]] had a bow of such wood<ref>{{Cite DTP|H 14.018}}</ref>, and so did the [[Woodmen]]<ref>{{Cite DTP|H 06.095}}</ref>, and the [[Orcs of Isengard]].<ref>{{Cite DTP|LR 3.01.030}}</ref>

During [[Berúthiel]]'s time as the [[Queen of Gondor|wife]] of [[King of Gondor|King]] [[Tarannon]] of [[Gondor]], she decorated the gardens of the [[King's House]] in [[Osgiliath]] "with tormented sculptures beneath [[cypresses]] and yews".<ref>{{UT|13a}}, note 7, pp. 401-2</ref>

== Portrayal in adaptations ==
'''2007: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':'''
:Wood of this tree can be foraged by expert foresters in the [[Lone-lands]], the [[North Downs]], [[Evendim]], and [[The Yondershire|the Yondershire]].<ref>{{LOTROW|Yew Branches|21 August 2025}}</ref>
